metadata.title: British Columbia Coastal Inlets, 1997-2000
metadata.description: CTD and hydrographic parameters of several inlets along coastal British Columbia and the west coast of Vancouver Island.
keywords: North Inner Coast (QCS, Hecate, Dixon Inlet and passages)
South Inner Coast (Johnstone, Georgia, JDF, inlets and passages)
metadata.notes:

Supplemental Information: Physical samples exist for this dataset. Custom software is available for use with this dataset.
